text: George Ferris may refer to: *George Ferris (cricketer) (born 1964), former cricketer for the Leeward Islands and Leicestershire *George Washington Gale Ferris, Jr. (1859–1896), American inventor of the Ferris wheel *George Ashmead Ferris, (1859–1958), American architect *George M. Ferris (1893–1992), American investment banker and philanthropist *George M. Ferris, Jr. (1927–2008), American investment banker and philanthropist
title: George Ferris
